00071 /* 
00072  *      Input
00073  *      -----
00074  *      Footswitch
00075  *      Radio sense lower floor
00076  *  Radio sense upper floor
00077  *  Computer RTS
00078  *  Inverted radio sense
00079  *  Inverted Computer RTS
00080  */
00081 
00083 typedef struct {
00085         unsigned char radio_pre_delay;  
00087         unsigned char radio_post_delay; 
00089         unsigned char amp_pre_delay;
00091         unsigned char amp_post_delay;
00093         unsigned char inhibit_pre_delay;
00095         unsigned char inhibit_post_delay;
00097         unsigned char antennas_post_delay;
00099         unsigned char active;           //Bit 0 = PTT Radio
00100                                                                                                         //Bit 1 = PTT Amp
00101                                                                                                         //Bit 2 = Inhibit enabled
00102 } struct_ptt_sequencer;
00103 
00105 typedef struct {
00107         unsigned int struct_size;
00109         struct_ptt_sequencer computer;          
00111         struct_ptt_sequencer footswitch;        
00113         struct_ptt_sequencer radio_sense;       
00122         unsigned char ptt_input;
00123 } struct_ptt;
